snippet: MOORE--Alan G. Kane Lodge No. 454, F. & A. M. mourns with profound sadness the death of our esteemed Brother and Life Member, Alan G. Moore, DSA on December 28, 2015. Born August 14, 1942 in Newark, NJ, he was raised at Kane Lodge on December 5, 1978 and served the craft faithfully for 38 years. A CPA and tax consultant for decades, Brother Moore served as Secretary and was a member of the Nominating Committee for many years. He will be missed by all who knew him. Mikhail Geller, Assistant Secretary Roger A. Becker, Master 1/3
lead_paragraph: MOORE--Alan G. Kane Lodge No. 454, F. & A. M. mourns with profound sadness the death of our esteemed Brother and Life Member, Alan G. Moore, DSA on December 28, 2015. A CPA and tax consultant for decades, Brother Moore served as Secretary and was a member of the Nominating Committee for many years. He will be missed by all who knew him. headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MOORE, ALAN G
